scenario_text.value: Hm? Shuuji? What are you doing out here?

Oh, I was just scouting out our route. I want
to make sure we take the easiest path.

Antylamon and I split things up so we can
cover more ground.

He really is a huge help. Things would be
much harder without him around.

(So... Shuuji’s getting along with his
monster!)

Hm? Why are you grinning like that? Did I say
something funny?
Shuuji, I...
What am I most excited about?
You’re an inspiration!
You’ve really changed!
This is so moving!

I want to be a Kemonogami Master like you!
You’re a real inspiration!

Me? A Kemonogami Master? Hold your horses,
there, Takuma.

I’m no master, okay? If anything, you’re the
real master here.
Me?!

Yes, you. All I’ve been doing is trying to be
like you and Agumon this whole time.
You’re the Kemonogami Master.

I can’t believe how much you’ve changed!
You’re just full of surprises!

Hey! Keep your voice down. Don’t scare me
like that.
Right, sorry, it’s just, well...

Shuuji, if I were a girl, I think I’d be in
love!
That’s how impressive you are right now!

Ha ha, well, I appreciate the compliment,
though I’m not sure I like how you put it...
I just think this is so moving!
Huh? What’s moving?
I mean, you were so harsh on Lopmon before.

But you’d never be able to tell that now. You
really have become a better person.

Ha ha, well, I won’t deny it. I was pretty
childish before.
I really was...
But anyway, I’m almost done here.

After we’ve finished scouting, we can all
move ahead.

(You know, Shuuji makes me think that maybe
we can do this.)

(With him leading the way, maybe we really
can all make it home.)
